rows.label: qst610401_msg0002
rows.name:
Here, let me tell you a rumor that's on
everybody's lips in the Imperial Capital.

rows.label: qst610401_msg0003
rows.name:
At the Bellyful Canteen down in the Old
Industrial District, ghosts are partying
and keeping everyone up!

rows.label: qst610401_msg0004
rows.name:
I know, I know.
You don't believe me.

rows.label: qst610401_msg0006
rows.name:
It's not just one or two people who've
heard these ghosts, you see.

rows.label: qst610401_msg0007
rows.name:
My coworker plucked up his courage
the other night and headed on over.
But then he came running home...

rows.label: qst610401_msg0008
rows.name:
He kept going on about feeling terrible,
like something was going to burst out
of his chest.

rows.label: qst610401_msg0009
rows.name:
You're looking at me like I'm crazy.
Listen, get over there and check it out
for yourself. You'll see.
